instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1990 820-01041 no backlight with 55V on line
threads.message:
Hi, 

No water damage, no visible bad component.

There are 55V on PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT and continuity to PIN 43 from C8460/61/62...

Already tried with new flex and 2 good know lcd panel. No way, there is no backlight on display. 


Thanks

threads.title: A1990 820-01041 no backlight with 55V on line
threads.message:
Try DFU revive.
If still the same, save data and do restore.
